titleStmt.title: Ethice christiana, or, The school of wisdom wherein the grounds of moral philosophy are demonstrated to comply with the principles of Christian religion, by a mixt exercise of grace and vertu / written originally in French ... by M. De la Serre ; and done into English by J.A.
titleStmt.author: La Serre, M. de (Jean-Puget), ca. 1600-1665.
Alardis, James.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D.M. for Henry Marsh,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
